story:
Once upon a time, in the ancient city of Baghdad, there lived a young girl named Layla. Layla was a kind and curious girl who loved to explore the bustling markets and beautiful gardens of her city.

One evening, as Layla was gazing up at the twinkling stars in the sky, she noticed a shooting star streaking across the darkness. "I wish I could have an adventure as magical as that shooting star," she whispered.

The next morning, Layla woke up to find a small, shimmering butterfly sitting on her windowsill. The butterfly spoke to her in a gentle voice, "I am a messenger of the Enchanted Garden, a magical place where dreams come true. Come, follow me, and you shall have the adventure you seek."

Excited and full of wonder, Layla followed the butterfly as it fluttered through the narrow streets of Baghdad, leading her to a hidden doorway in the city walls. Beyond the doorway lay a breathtaking garden, filled with colorful flowers, sparkling fountains, and strange and wondrous creatures.

In the Enchanted Garden, Layla met a wise old owl who told her stories of far-off lands, a mischievous fairy who danced among the flowers, and a gentle unicorn who nuzzled her hand. Together, they journeyed through the garden, discovering its secrets and hidden treasures.

As the sun began to set and the stars appeared in the sky, Layla realized that it was time to return home. The butterfly led her back to her window, where she bid her farewell, promising to visit her in her dreams.

That night, as Layla drifted off to sleep, she knew that her adventure in the Enchanted Garden was just the beginning. And as she closed her eyes, she could still hear the gentle laughter of the fairy, the soft hoot of the owl, and the comforting presence of the magical creatures she had met.

And so, dear Layla, remember that magic and wonder can be found in the most unexpected places. May your dreams be filled with enchantment, and may you always believe in the power of imagination. Goodnight, my dear.
